underConstruction.heading: Questo è strano
underConstruction.message: Sei incappato su una pagina ancora in fase di sviluppo. Mi piacerebbe mostrarla, ma non è ancora abbastanza pronta.

authScene.claimText: This Stump server is not intialized. Use the form below to create your account. Once created, you will have full access to all server features.

libraryConfiguration.heading: Configurazione della libreria
libraryConfiguration.subtitleCreating: A preview of your new library will be shown below
libraryConfiguration.subtitleEditing: A preview of your library edits will be shown below

emailBook.heading: Email book
emailBook.description: Send this book to device or email address

email.label: Email
email.description: An email address to send the book to. Click add to finalize each input

createBookClubScene.heading: Create a new book club
createBookClubScene.subtitle: You can create a private book club a select few, or make it public for anyone on the server to join

name.label: Nome
name.description: Il nome del tuo club del libro

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: An 'Our Flag Means Death' fan club. We read pirate fiction to our hearts content
description.description: An optional, short description of your book club

is_private.label: Private club
is_private.description: If enabled, only users you invite will be able to join your book club

member_role_spec.heading: Custom role mapping
subtitle: Puoi creare nomi personalizzati per i ruoli nel tuo club di libri, se vuoi. Per ulteriori informazioni, fai riferimento al
documentation

member.label: Member
member.description: Il nome del ruolo predefinito per il tuo club del libro

moderator.label: Moderator
moderator.description: Il nome del ruolo di moderatore per il tuo club del libro

admin.label: Admin
admin.description: Il nome del ruolo di amministratore per il tuo club del libro

creator.label: Creator
creator.description: Il nome del ruolo di creatore per il tuo club del libro. Questo sei tu!

creator_preferences.heading: Your membership preferences
creator_preferences.subtitle: Preferenze per la propria iscrizione al club del libro

creator_display_name.label: Display Name
creator_display_name.description: Un nome opzionale per la tua iscrizione nel club del libro. Se impostato, ha la precedenza sul tuo nome utente

creator_hide_progress.label: Hide Progress
creator_hide_progress.description: If enabled, your read progress will be hidden from other members of the book club

name.label: Name
name.description: A friendly name for your library

path.label: Path
path.description: The path to the library as it exists on your server

description.label: Description
description.description: A short description of your library
description.placeholder: A library of all my favorite books

tags.label: Tags
tags.description: Used to categorize your library or enforce access rules

section.description: Improve loading times while browsing your library by generating thumbnails for your books

enableSwitch.label: Enabled
enableSwitch.description: Generate thumbnail images for this library

scaled.label: Scaled
scaled.description: Scale the image by a custom factor per dimension

sized.label: Explicitly Sized
sized.description: Set each dimension of the thumbnail (in pixels)

format.label: Image format
format.description: The format of the generated thumbnail images

quality.label: Quality
quality.description: The quality of the generated thumbnail images, between 0 and 1.0

section.heading: Ignore rules
section.description: Define glob patterns to ignore certain files or directories during a scan

ignoreRules.noRules: No ignore rules have been configured

addRule.label: New rule
addRule.description: Glob pattern to ignore files or directories

section.heading: File conversion
section.description: Stump is capable of converting certain file formats to more compatible ones

rarToZip.label: Convert RAR to ZIP
rarToZip.description: Convert RAR/CBR files to ZIP/CBZ files during a scan

deleteRarAfter.label: Delete RAR after conversion
deleteRarAfter.description: Delete the original RAR/CBR file after conversion. This is irreversible

section.heading: Optional processing
section.description: Opt-in processing features for the scanner
section.disclaimer: These features involve additional file reads which may slow down the scan process

processMetadata.label: Process metadata
processMetadata.description: Extract any metadata from library files and store the results in the database

generateFileHashes.label: Generate file hashes
generateFileHashes.description: Generate a hash for each file in the library to detect duplicates

section.heading: Organization
section.description: Identify which pattern most closely matches the organization of your library
docs: Not sure which to choose? Click
You cannot change this setting later

options.label: Library pattern
options.description: The setting which determines how Stump will organize your library

collectionPriority.label: Collection priority
collectionPriority.description: Each folder at the top-most level of the library root is a single series

seriesPriority.label: Series priority
seriesPriority.description: Each folder at any level recursively is a single series

scan.description: Index the library files to populate your database

createLibraryScene.heading: Crea nuova libreria
createLibraryScene.subtitle: Le librerie sono usate per raggruppare i tuoi libri insieme. Se vuoi un ripasso su come funzionano, dai un'occhiata alla

steps.label: Basics

steps.description: The details of this library, including its name, path, and description

steps.label: Scanning
steps.heading: Scanner Behavior
steps.description: Settings related to how Stump scans this library

steps.label: Thumbnails
steps.heading: Thumbnails
steps.description: The options for if and how Stump generates thumbnails for this library

steps.label: Review
steps.heading: Review
steps.description: Review your library settings before creating it

librarySettingsScene.heading: Impostazioni libreria
librarySettingsScene.subtitle: Gestisci qui la tua libreria. Se desideri aggiornare queste impostazioni, controlla il

basics.title: Basic Information
basics.description: The details of this library, including its name, path, and description

options/scanning.title: Scanner Behavior
options/scanning.description: Settings related to how Stump scans this library

options/thumbnails.title: Thumbnails
options/thumbnails.description: Settings and management options for thumbnails in this library

management.heading: Management
management.description: Manage the existing thumbnails for this library

options/analysis.title: Analysis
options/analysis.description: Analyze the contents of this library to identify potential issues or improvements

analyzeBooks.heading: Analyze books
analyzeBooks.description: Analyze the books in this library to attach additional metadata in the database, such as page dimensions for image-based books
analyzeBooks.disclaimer: This process is resource-intensive and may take a while to complete. In the future, it will be more configurable

missingFiles.heading: Missing files
missingFiles.description: Files that are referenced in the database but cannot be located on disk
missingFiles.noMissingFiles: There are no missing files in this library

duplicateFiles.heading: Duplicate files
duplicateFiles.description: Files that are potentially duplicated on disk
duplicateFiles.noDuplicateFiles: There are no duplicate files detected for this library

danger-zone/access-control.title: Access Control
danger-zone/access-control.description: Control who can access the content in this library

libraryExclusions.heading: Exclude users
libraryExclusions.description: Prevent certain users from accessing this library or its contents
libraryExclusions.noUsers: There are no other registered users to exclude from this library

danger-zone/delete.title: Deletion Actions
danger-zone/delete.description: Permanently delete this library and all of its contents or certain resources

cleanLibrary.heading: Clean library
cleanLibrary.description: Remove all media and series that cannot be located on disk
cleanLibrary.disclaimer: While this action will not delete any files, it will permanently delete all records relating to media and series which have a missing status

confirmation.label: Clean library
confirmation.text: Are you sure you want to clean this library?

deleteLibrary.heading: Delete library
description: Permanently delete this library and all its contents.

errorScene.heading: Ops, si è verificato un errore

emptyState.heading: No books to display
emptyState.message: Any books you're currently reading will show up here

emptyState.heading: No series to display
emptyState.message: Any series you add to your libraries will show up here

emptyState.heading: No books to display
emptyState.message: Any books you add to your libraries will show up here

userSmartListsScene.heading: Smart lists
userSmartListsScene.subtitle: Your favorite searches and filters saved for easy access

emptyState.heading: No smart lists to display
emptyState.noListsMessage: Create a smart list to get started

layout.missingIdError: This scene requires an ID in the URL

filterDrawer.heading: Smart list filters
filterDrawer.description: Change the filters for this viewing session

rawData.heading: Raw filter data
rawData.description: This is how Stump will process the filters

description.create: Create a new view for this smart list

name.label: Nome
name.description: A friendly name to uniquely identify this view

name.label: Nome
name.description: The updated name for this view, if desired

errors.updateFailed: A server error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again.

avatarPicker.heading: Set your Avatar Image
avatarPicker.subtitle: Stump supports custom avatars, which can be set by providing a URL to an image. Image uploads are not supported in order to reduce the amount of data stored on the server.
avatarPicker.preview: A preview will appear here once you have entered a URL.

locale.heading: Language and locale
subtitle: Stump supports multiple languages and locales, set your preferences below. Please consider helping improve the quality of
Stump's translations
if you're able to!

app/appearance.title: Appearance
app/appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application

themeSelect.label: Theme
description: If you're interested in creating your own custom theme, check out the

fontSelect.label: Font
fontSelect.description: Customize the font used in the application

description.sidebar: Arrange and customize the navigation items in the sidebar
description.topbar: Arrange and customize the navigation items in the topbar

createAction.label: Show create action
createAction.help: Show the create action in the navigation

linkToAll.label: See all link
linkToAll.help: A link to a page dedicated to viewing all items of this type

app/reader.title: Reader settings
app/reader.description: Default options for the Stump readers. These are bound to your current device only

imageBasedBooks.label: Image-based books
imageBasedBooks.description: Comic books, manga, and other image-based books

preloadAheadCount.label: Preload ahead count
preloadAheadCount.description: The number of pages to preload ahead of the current page

preloadBehindCount.label: Preload behind count
preloadBehindCount.description: The number of pages to preload behind the current page

app/desktop.title: Desktop settings
app/desktop.description: Settings related to the Stump desktop application

configuredServers.label: Configured servers
configuredServers.description: The list of Stump servers you can connect to

validation.nameExists: A server with this name already exists
validation.urlExists: A server with this URL already exists

name.label: Name
name.description: A friendly name to identify this server

uri.label: URI
uri.description: The URL of the Stump server

addServer.title: Add a new server
addServer.description: Add a new Stump server to the desktop application

editServer.title: Edit server
editServer.description: Edit the details of this server

confirmation.title: Delete this server
confirmation.description: This will remove the server from the desktop application
confirmation.disclaimerActiveServer: This server is currently active. You will be logged out
confirmation.disclaimerLastServer: This is the last configured server. You will be logged out and have to reconfigure any servers in the initialization process

confirmation.title: Switch to this server
confirmation.description: This will log you out of your current server

resetConfiguration.label: Delete all servers
description: Delete all configured servers from the desktop application

confirmation.title: Delete all servers
confirmation.description: This will remove all servers from the desktop application
confirmation.disclaimer: You will be logged out and have to reconfigure any servers in the initialization process

optionalFeatures.label: Optional features
optionalFeatures.description: Manage the optional features unique to the desktop application

bundledServer.label: Bundled server
bundledServer.description: Run the bundled server in the background while the desktop application is running (requires restart)

discordPresence.label: Discord Presence
discordPresence.description: Display your Stump activity in Discord using Discord Rich Presence

server/general.title: General settings
server/general.description: General settings related to your Stump server instance

updateAvailable.message: Your server is not up to date. Please update to the latest version!

serverInfo.title: Server information
serverInfo.description: Basic details about your Stump server instance

build.label: Build
build.description: Details about the version and build

serverPublicUrl.label: Public URL
serverPublicUrl.description: The URL that your server is accessible from outside your network, if applicable. This will enable invite links and other features

server/logs.title: Logs
server/logs.description: The logs generated by your Stump server instance

persistedLogs.title: Persisted logs
persistedLogs.description: These logs have been manually persisted to the database, typically associated with a specific job or event

table.emptySubtitle: Your server is either very healthy or very unhealthy

liveLogs.title: Live logs feed
liveLogs.description: Streamed directly from your Stump server instance in real-time

server/jobs.title: Jobs
server/jobs.description: Background jobs that run on your Stump server instance

scheduling.title: Scheduling
scheduling.description: Some jobs can be configured to run on a schedule. Changes to this configuration will take effect after a server restart

history.title: History
history.description: A record of jobs that have been run on your Stump server instance

table.emptyHeading: There are no jobs to display
table.emptySubtitle: You can't have a job if you don't have a job
table.deleteAllMessage: Job history and statistics may be deleted from the database at any time. This action cannot be undone

server/users.title: Users
server/users.description: Manage the users on this server

createUser.title: Create user
createUser.description: Create a new user on this server

updateUser.title: Update user
updateUser.description: Update the details of this user

accessControl.heading: Access control and restrictions
subtitle: Configure any restrictions you want to apply to this user. For more information about access control, see the
documentation

ageRestriction.label: Age restriction
ageRestriction.description: Restricts the user from accessing content above the set age rating threshold

enforceUnset.label: Enforce on unset
enforceUnset.description: If enabled, users will be restricted from accessing content with no age rating available

tagRestriction.label: Tag restrictions
tagRestriction.description: Restricts the user from accessing content with the selected tags

permissions.heading: Permissions
subtitle: Select the permissions you want to grant to this user. For more information on what each permission does, see the
documentation

read.label: Access book club features
read.description: Allows the user to access book club features, including viewing and joining book clubs

create.label: Create book clubs
create.description: Allows the user to create new book clubs

explorer.label: Esplora file
explorer.description: Consente all'utente di accedere ai vari esplora file. La restrizione dei contenuti non può essere garantita quando questa funzione viene abilitata

download.label: Download files
download.description: Allows the user to download files from the server

upload.label: Upload files
upload.description: Consente all'utente di caricare file sul server

create.label: Creare librerie
create.description:
Consente all'utente di creare nuove librerie.
Include le autorizzazioni per modificare ed eseguire la scansione

scan.label: Scansionare librerie
scan.description: Consente all'utente di avviare scansioni per le librerie esistenti

edit.label: Modificare librerie
edit.description: Consente all'utente di modificare i dettagli di base per le librerie esistenti

manage.label: Gestire librerie
manage.description:
Consente all'utente di gestire le impostazioni avanzate per le librerie esistenti.
Include le autorizzazioni per modificare ed eseguire la scansione

delete.label: Eliminare librerie
delete.description:
Consente all'utente di eliminare le librerie esistenti.
Include le autorizzazioni per modificare, gestire ed eseguire scansioni

manage.label: Gestire server
manage.description:
Consente all'utente di gestire il server.
Include *molte* altre autorizzazioni

read.label: Leggere utenti
read.description: Consente all'utente d'interrogare altri utenti sul server. Richiesto per altre funzionalità, ad esempio escludere gli utenti dall'accesso a una libreria

manage.label: Gestire utenti
manage.description:
Consente all'utente di gestire altri utenti sul server.
Include i permessi per leggere, creare e aggiornare

read.label: Access smart list feature
read.description: Consente all'utente di accedere alle funzionalità delle smart list. Le autorizzazioni granulari non sono ancora implementate, quindi questa include i permessi per leggere, creare e aggiornare le proprie liste

validation.ageRestrictionTooLow: La limitazione dell'età non può essere inferiore a 0

server/email.title: Email
server/email.description: Settings related to the configuring an SMTP emailer for your Stump server instance

emailers.title: SMTP emailers
emailers.description: The clients you have configured for sending emails from your Stump server instance
emailers.singleInstanceDisclaimer: While Stump supports multiple SMTP configurations in the backend, only one can be configured on the UI. This will be improved in the future

sendHistory.heading: Send history
sendHistory.description: A record of emails sent from this emailer
sendHistory.emptySubtitle: The history of this emailer is empty. It has either not been used or the history has been cleared

devices.title: Email devices
devices.description: The device aliases you have configured for recieving emails from your Stump server instance

name.label: Nome
name.description: A friendly name to uniquely identify this device alias

email.label: Email
email.description: The email address this alias will be associated with

forbidden.label: Vietato
forbidden.description: When enabled, no user may send emails to the address associated with this alias

table.emptySubtitle: Create a new device alias for future use

name.label: Nome
name.description: A friendly name to uniquely identify this emailer

smtpSettings.heading: SMTP settings
smtpSettings.description: The SMTP-specific settings for this emailer

smtpProvider.label: SMTP provider preset
smtpProvider.description: The provider of the SMTP server. This is used to prefill some common settings, but doesn't capture all providers

smtpHost.label: SMTP host
smtpHost.description: The hostname of the SMTP server

smtpPort.label: SMTP port
smtpPort.description: The port of the SMTP server

tlsEnabled.label: TLS enabled
tlsEnabled.description: If enabled, the connection to the SMTP server will be encrypted

username.label: Nome utente
username.description: Il nome utente per l'autenticazione con il server SMTP. Tipicamente è l'indirizzo email

password.label: Password
password.description: The password for authenticating with the SMTP server. If you're using Gmail, you may need to generate an app-specific password

senderSettings.heading: Sender settings
senderSettings.description: The settings for the sender of the email

senderDisplayName.label: Nome visualizzato del mittente
senderDisplayName.description: The name that will be displayed to recipients

senderEmail.label: Sender email address
senderEmail.description: The email address that will be displayed to recipients

maxAttachmentSize.label: Max attachment size
maxAttachmentSize.description: The maximum size, in bytes, that an attachment can be

createEmailer.title: Create emailer
createEmailer.description: Create a new SMTP emailer for your Stump server instance

updateEmailer.title: Update emailer
updateEmailer.description: Update the details of this SMTP emailer

noLibraries.heading: Niente da vedere qui
noLibraries.messagePrefix: You can't see what you don't have

message.wait: Una volta create le librerie, verranno visualizzate qui

serverSOS.heading: Server non disponibile

desktop.message:
Si è verificato un errore di rete, sembra che il tuo server Stump non è al momento disponibile. Assicurati che sia in funzione e accessibile da questo dispositivo.
Se l'URL del tuo server è cambiato, puoi aggiornarlo utilizzando il modulo sottostante

web.message: Si è verificato un errore di rete, sembra che il tuo server Stump non è al momento disponibile. Assicurati che sia in funzione e accessibile da questo dispositivo

serverSOS.reconnected: Riconnesso al server! Redirezione in corso...

serverStatusOverlay.heading: Il server non è connesso
message: per cambiare l'URL del tuo server

uploadImage.emptyState: Un'anteprima della tua immagine apparirà qui
uploadImage.prompt: Trascina qui l'immagine o fai clic per selezionare

common.unimplemented: Questa funzionalità non è stata ancora implementata! Riprova più tardi
common.limitedFunctionality: Questo non è stato ancora implementato completamente e mancano alcune funzionalità. Riprova più tardi
